thread.title: NBA fan Jarrius destroys DeAndre Jordan with brutal insult
thread.title_full: NBA fan Jarrius destroys DeAndre Jordan with brutal insult

title: NBA fan Jarrius destroys DeAndre Jordan with brutal insult
text:
NBA fan Jarrius destroys DeAndre Jordan with brutal insult Jarrius is the best. Post to Facebook NBA fan Jarrius destroys DeAndre Jordan with brutal insult Jarrius is the best.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/nba-fan-jarrius-robertson-deandre-jordan-joke-insult-all-star-weekend-shoot-better/   NBA fan Jarrius destroys DeAndre Jordan with brutal insult Andrew Joseph Published 4:53   | Updated 7 minutes ago 
Screenshot (Photo: Twitter) 
NBA fan Jarrius "J.J." Robertson has stolen the show at NBA All-Star weekend. The 14-year-old is battling a chronic liver disease called biliary atresia. As Robertson continues to inspire, he's also brought the jokes to the NBA All-Star festivities. 
DeAndre Jordan learned that the hard way on Saturday. 
Robertson asked Jordan to sign his WWE belt, and as Jordan was signing the belt, he complimented Robertson on his jumper during the celebrity game. Then, Robertson hit Jordan back in the most shocking way. â€” LA Clippers (@LAClippers) February 19, 2017 
"I shoot better than you," he said. 
Oh man. Oh man. 
Jordan was speechless. He couldn't come back from that. 
Jarrius is the best. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/nba-fan-jarrius-robertson-deandre-jordan-joke-insult-all-star-weekend-shoot-better/ Most Popular
